text: Aarón Hernán (November 20, 1930 - April 26, 2020) was an Mexican telenovela and movie actor. Hernán has appeared in over 100 Spanish telenovelas and over 67 movies. He was known for playing priests on telenovelas. He appeared in two American movies, Apolinar and Black Wind. Hernán was born on November 20, 1930 in Camargo, Chihuahua. He died on April 26, 2020 in Mexico City of a heart attack, aged 89.Actor Aarón Hernán dies at 89 years of age ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Actors from Chihuahua (state)
title: Aarón Hernán
